Career.Grand Slam victories: 10: Masters: 1 (2017); The National: 1 (2017); Players' (2011, 2014, 2017); Champions Cup (2016); Autumn Gold (2014); Manitoba Liquor & Lotteries (2013); Sobeys Slam (2010); Colonial Square (2013)

Bronze medal - third place | 2008 Östersund | Women's

Gold medal - first place | 2021 Saskatoon | Women's
Bronze medal - third place | 2017 Ottawa | Women's
